QuestData.Title: They Who Held Fast
QuestData.Description: The siege has been broken - they underestimated the resilience of Stonefang, and our reinforcement wave from Bladespire caught them completely off-guard.$B$BOnce we finish cleaning up here, we rally anyone who can still fight and prepare to march for Grom'gar.$B$BThe outpost captain, Karg Bloodfury, should have come out to meet us by now. Can you get him out here?$B$BTell him Lokra is waiting. He knows how much I hate to be kept waiting.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Karg Bloodfury in Stonefang Outpost.
QuestData.RewardText: You're back! But where is Karg?
